directories.name: 97181_scalar_video_instructions
directories.description: All scalar video instructions operate on 32-bit register operands. The scalar video instructions are:

directories.name: 97182_simd_video_instructions
directories.description: The SIMD video instructions operate on pairs of 16-bit values and quads of 8-bit values.

files.title: Overview
files.summary: All video instructions operate on 32-bit register operands. However, the video instructions may be classified as either scalar or SIMD based on whether their core operation applies to one or multiple values.
